H0.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Led Zeppelin

H1.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Aerosmith

H2.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. The Rolling Stones

H3.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Quene

A4.text: Sheer Heart Attack is the third studio album by the British rock band Queen

A5.text: Queen's official website lists Sheer Heart Attack in their discography

A6.text: A Day at the Races is the fifth studio album by the British rock band Queen

A7.text: A Day at the Races is listed in Queen's official discography
